name: In Arms - Part 1
description:
Saying yes gets easier the more he does it.

Yes, he'll return to Konoha. Yes, he'll stay and raise Naruto the best way he knows how. Yes, he'll take Sasuke in, too.

The past is behind him. For the sake of the future, Jiraiya will do whatever he can.

This part 1 of an ongoing interactive fic for Naruto. This is a not-for-profit, fan-made product.
